description: A highly versatile midlayer that’s both lightweight and highly protective, the Alpine Start Insulated Hoody is designed for high-output endeavors in cold conditions. The Schoeller stretch nylon face fabric provides abrasion resistant wind and weather protection, while Polartec Alpha is mapped in key areas like front of chest, shoulders, upper arms, and back panel to balance warmth and breathability. The Alpine Start Insulated Hoody is designed with a silhouette that allows unrestricted freedom of movement, an adjustable hood, and a drop hem. All zippers are DWR treated and the jacket stows into front chest pocket.
name: Black Diamond Alpine Start Insulated Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Nylon Stretch Woven with Schoeller Eco-Repel Bio DWR - 93% Nylon, 7% Elastane, 80 g
Polartec Alpha Direct Fleece Insulation - 100% Polyester, 120 g
